mapper.select: SELECT q.id, q.parent_id, q.depth, q.subject, q.content, q.create_date, q.update_date, u.id AS author_id, u.username AS author_username, u.email AS author_email FROM question q LEFT JOIN site_user u ON q.author_id = u.id WHERE q.depth = 0 ORDER BY q.create_date DESC

SELECT q.id, q.parent_id, q.depth, q.subject, q.content, q.create_date, q.update_date, u.id AS author_id, u.username AS author_username, u.email AS author_email FROM question q LEFT JOIN site_user u ON q.author_id = u.id WHERE q.id = #{id}
